Description:
Position Title: Fraud Data Analyst II
Department: Customer Operations
Location: KarachiWe’re looking for a highly-driven and motivated “Fraud Data Analyst” for our team in Pakistan. If you are
looking for a place where you can gain hands-on exposure and have a direct impact, then this may be the
place for you!The ideal candidate will have a track record as a significant individual contributor – comfortable working
independently, whilst working closely with the management team. This role will be based in Pakistan and
will report to the “ Senior Manager – Risk & Fraud”.Responsibilities:
● As one of the brains behind our customers’ operations, you will be responsible for the
performance analysis, optimization and process design of fraud detection systems and
frameworks
● You will lead towards designing in best-in-class service functions to address customer
segmentation based on fraudulent refund and cashloss
● You’ll be in a highly data-driven role working on risk analysis, and recommending changes in
fraud thresholds with a key focus on outer loop initiatives to improve user experience
● You’ll be adept at managing stakeholders, be it the city or functional managers or vendors to
influence business goals with the ultimate purpose to reduce fraud
● You’ll be required to be deeply involved with our Shared Service Centre in Malaysia to
collaborate, understand and implement our regional and global best practicesRequirements:
● Bachelor's degree program in STEM from a reputable institution, Masters is a plus
● Several years of experience in analytical roles involving risk or cost optimization related
strategy. Analytical mindset is a must. Exact role can vary depending on experience.
● Expertise in SQL and Python knowledge is a must,Git / DBT is a plus
● You are comfortable using business intelligence tools (e.g. Tableau, Google Data Studio)
● You are proficient in segmentation, outlier detection and correlation via Excel, g-sheet or
other tools
● Highly organized and self-disciplined, able to work on multiple projects in a self-structured
and well-prioritized way
● Data-driven & with a keen eye on process improvement
● Effective communication and interpersonal skills with a problem-solving attitude is the
cornerstone of your personality
● You must be adept at G-SuiteA little About Us:
We are fast, like mind boggling fast! So if you’re someone who loves ever changing goals and
loves optimization, you’re the right fit for us!
We love people who can develop things from scratch, own them and then work on improving
them.
We love what we do, and we don’t rest until we’ve achieved our targets. So if you’re also
someone who is driven until the dream is achieved, come join us!Job Details
